name: Put in it! Trump it! Ping it!
name_original: Put in it! Trump it! Ping it!
description:
Another remake of a legendary puzzle game from a former Soviet Union. Considered to be the best computer puzzle game of all time.

Why another remake? - Well it is a remake of a remake, idea came from the old DOS game with beautiful pictures changing in the back. Why not modernize it for the modern day Windows environment.

Comes with a three available themes for every world power. Each theme has it's distinct graphics, music and sound effects while the game rules remain.
